name: D.O.G.G.O.S.
description:
D.O.G.G.O.S.

Doggos On Glovos Global On The Sky

This is a tower defense about dogs living in the sky on their little houses trying to defend their homes!

Left click To move
Right click to drop a dog Turret

Made for Global Game Jam 2019 - What home means to you

Made by :

Francisco Delledonne - Programming

  • @Delleloper

Matias Schmeid - 2D Art

  • maitan69.itch.io
  • @maitan69

Carolina Conzonno - Music and FX

Made with Godot Engine <3
